    • Method Detail

      • modifyHash

        public boolean modifyHash(int blockID,
                          java.lang.String newHash)
        Manually sets the hash value of a specified block.
        Parameters:
        blockID - ID of the block that will be modified.
        newHash - number to be assigned as the hash for the block.
        Returns:
        true if the hash was successfully assigned, false if no block with matching ID was found.

      • add

        public boolean add(int element)
            throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Adds an elements to the blockchain
        Parameters:
        element - wanted to be added in the avl tree.
        Returns:
        true if the element was added to the AVL tree. False otherwise.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • remove

        public boolean remove(int element)
               throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Removes an element from the blockchain
        Parameters:
        element - that is going to be removed.
        Returns:
        true if it was succesfully removed from the tree, or false if there wasn't such element in the tree.
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException

      • getBalance

        public AVLTree getBalance()
        Returns:
        current tree balance.

      • validate

        public boolean validate()
        Checks the integrity of the blockchain
        Returns:
        true if the blockchain is validated or false otherwise.

      • mine

        public void mine(Block block,
                 java.lang.String alg,
                 int zeros)
          throws java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Tries hashes by brute force until it finds one that returns true when passed as an argument in "miningCondtion()"
        Parameters:
        block - wanted to be mined
        alg - the algorithm saved in the block
        zeros - amount of zeros wanted in the hash
        Throws:
        java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
